fields.label: Icon
fields.name: icon
fields.instructions: Icon to be displayed above the title

fields.label: Section ID
fields.name: section_id
fields.instructions:
This field is used for mapping the section id defined in a content table block - it must be url safe.
Leave this field empty if this is not a section to be displayed in the content table.

fields.label: Text
fields.name: description
fields.default_value: Not sure which cannabis products are best for you? Meet with a cannabis counselor and get personalized guidance.

fields.label: Cards Help
fields.message:
Adds a list of card items.
Minimum of 3 items can be set. See preview here.

fields.label: Column Gap
fields.name: column_gap
fields.instructions:
The distance between text content and image will be larger.
Also, content will be aligned from the top instead from center.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions:
Use these tags for the text layout:
<em data-highlight="circle">content inside</em> - to wrap text in circle highlight
<span class="text-green">content inside</span> - to use green color for text
<em data-highlight="underline">content inside</em> - to use green underline
<em data-highlight="leaf"></em> - to use leaf icon

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions:
Use these tags for the text layout:
<em data-highlight="circle">content inside</em> - to wrap text in circle highlight
<span class="text-green">content inside</span> - to use green color for text
<em data-highlight="underline">content inside</em> - to use green underline
<em data-highlight="leaf"></em> - to use leaf icon
<span class="underline line-simple">content inside</span> - to use green simple line underline

fields.label: Chart Layout
fields.name: chart_layout
fields.instructions: Please check here to see the design for each option

fields.label: Column One Data Series
fields.name: column_one_data_series
fields.instructions: Represents the type of data that is being measured (example: Patients, Studies, Male, Female, etc.)

fields.label: Column Two Data Series
fields.name: column_two_data_series
fields.instructions: Represents the type of data that is being measured (example: Patients, Studies, Male, Female, etc.)

sub_fields.label: Value
sub_fields.name: value
sub_fields.instructions: Insert only the value without units

sub_fields.label: Data Series
sub_fields.name: data_series
sub_fields.instructions: Represents the type of subject that is being measured (example: Patients, Studies, etc.)

sub_fields.label: Value One
sub_fields.name: value_one
sub_fields.instructions: Insert only the value without units

sub_fields.label: Value Two
sub_fields.name: value_two
sub_fields.instructions: Insert only the value without units

fields.label: Content Left
fields.name: content_left
fields.instructions: The content will be displayed on the right column of the grid

fields.label: Content Right
fields.name: content_right
fields.instructions: The content will be displayed on the left column of the grid

fields.label: Content
fields.name: content
fields.instructions: Content will be displayed (on desktop) on the right column of the grid

fields.label: Image
fields.name: image
fields.instructions: Image will be displayed (on desktop) on the left column of the grid

fields.label: Youtube Video Id
fields.name: youtube_video_id
fields.instructions:
Video will be displayed (on desktop) on the left column of the grid

The youtube video id (example: 3VS0pv-EPcc in https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3VS0pv-EPcc)

fields.label: Section Id
fields.name: section_id
fields.instructions: Text to use as anchor. Must be url safe - no spaces or special character (eg: a-valid-id)

fields.label: Form Title Text Size
fields.name: form_title_text_size
fields.instructions: Please note that the large option for the form title will be displayed as an h2 html tag - choose this option if there is no block title defined

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: columns
fields.instructions: Please select the number of columns for the form, ie, if the form fields should be display in one column, or be divided in two columns (useful when the form has more than 3 fields)

fields.label: Rounded Corners
fields.name: rounded_corners
fields.message: Check the box if the image should be displayed with the its corners rounded

fields.label: Larger Paragraph
fields.name: larger_paragraph
fields.message: Check this box if you want to use a 19px font size for the description paragraph element - default is 16px

fields.label: Rating Stars
fields.name: rating_stars
fields.instructions: This field will display a stars rating value - from 1 to 5 - in the bottom-left corner of the image. Please select the number to de displayed. If the value is zero, the rating won't be shown.

fields.label: Section Label
fields.name: label
fields.instructions:
Use these tags for the text layout:
<em data-highlight="circle">content inside</em> - to wrap text in circle highlight
<span class="text-green">content inside</span> - to use green color for text
<em data-highlight="underline">content inside</em> - to use zigzag green underline
<span class="underline underline-green-400 underline-offset-small">content inside</span> - to use simple green underline
<em data-highlight="leaf"></em> - to use leaf icon

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions:
Use these tags for the text layout:
<em data-highlight="circle">content inside</em> - to wrap text in circle highlight
<span class="text-green">content inside</span> - to use green color for text
<em data-highlight="underline">content inside</em> - to use zigzag green underline
<span class="underline underline-green-400 underline-offset-small">content inside</span> - to use simple green underline
<em data-highlight="leaf"></em> - to use leaf icon

fields.label: Larger Paragraph
fields.name: larger_paragraph
fields.message: Check this box if you want to use a 19px font size for the description - default is 14px

choices.secondary: Items side by side with cards

fields.label: Image
fields.name: image
fields.instructions: This will display a card with only the selected image

fields.label: Larger Paragraph
fields.name: larger_paragraph
fields.message: Check this box if you want to use a 19px font size for the description - default is 16px

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions:
Use these tags for the text layout:
<em data-highlight="circle">content inside</em> - to wrap text in circle highlight
<span class="text-green">content inside</span> - to use green color for text
<em data-highlight="underline">content inside</em> - to use green underline
<em data-highlight="leaf"></em> - to use leaf icon
<em data-highlight="fade-in"></em> - to use a fade-in effect

fields.label: Section ID
fields.name: section_id
fields.instructions:
This field is used for mapping the section id defined in a content table block - it must be url safe.
Leave this field empty if this is not a section to be displayed in the content table.

fields.label: Line
fields.message: This block adds a divider line

fields.label: List help
fields.message: Adds an item list with cards. See preview here.

choices.column: Items side by side with title

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions:
Use these tags for the text layout:
<em data-highlight="circle">content inside</em> - to wrap text in circle highlight
<span class="text-green">content inside</span> - to use green color for text
<em data-highlight="underline">content inside</em> - to use zigzag green underline
<span class="underline underline-green-400 underline-offset-small">content inside</span> - to use simple green underline
<em data-highlight="leaf"></em> - to use leaf icon

choices.aligned: Label side by side with title

fields.label: Display divider
fields.name: divider
fields.message: Check the box if you want to display a vertical line dividing each card

fields.label: Display list count
fields.name: list_numbered
fields.message: Display list count in each item

sub_fields.label: Full width image
sub_fields.name: full_width_image
sub_fields.instructions: True will set the image with the same width as the card

fields.label: Text
fields.name: description
fields.default_value: Select your state from the drop down and we’ll let you know.

sub_fields.label: Image Alignment
sub_fields.name: image_alignment
sub_fields.instructions:
Middle - displays image between title and content
Icon : displays image as an icon after the title
Right Corner: the image is placed in the right corner of the card
Right : the image is placed on the right of the title and content

fields.label: Reviews Source
fields.message:
By default the reviews are fetched from google.
If the trustpilot checkbox is checked this block will display the trustpilot widget.

fields.label: Quoted
fields.name: quoted
fields.message: Add a double quote to the content review

fields.label: Larger Paragraph
fields.name: larger_paragraph
fields.message: Check this box if you want to use a 19px font size for the description - default is 16px

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: columns
fields.instructions: 3 columns layout is only available if subtitle is not empty.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions:
Use these tags for the text layout:
<em data-highlight="circle">content inside</em> - to wrap text in circle highlight
<span class="text-green">content inside</span> - to use green color for text
<em data-highlight="underline">content inside</em> - to use zigzag green underline
<span class="underline underline-green-400 underline-offset-small">content inside</span> - to use simple green underline
<em data-highlight="leaf"></em> - to use leaf icon

fields.label: Content right
fields.name: content_right
fields.instructions: Add content to be displayed on the right side of the section. Only applies if image alignment is center.

fields.label: Full Width
fields.name: full_width
fields.instructions: Select this field if this block should have the screen full width

choices.primary: All Sections Filled with Lilac Background
choices.secondary: Only Title Section Filled with Lilac Background

fields.label: Form url
fields.name: form_url
fields.instructions: Custom form url. Leave blank to use the default.

fields.label: Laws placeholder
fields.name: law_statuses
fields.instructions: Leave this field as is. It's used as a placeholder for the map data.

fields.label: Icon
fields.name: icon
fields.instructions: Icon to be displayed above title

sub_fields.label: Main Strain
sub_fields.name: main_strain
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box if this strain should be the first onde to appear in the list

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions:
Add the section id without the #
Example: section-id

fields.label: Video Size
fields.name: video_size
fields.instructions:
Large size will display the video with the same window size as the others page blocks
Small size will add some extra padding to the video window

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: You can use this field to display a custom video thumbnail

fields.label: Application process
fields.name: application_process
fields.instructions:
To hide this section clear all the content (title, description, extra info).
The steps displayed in the frontend come from the corresponding medical card page.

sub_fields.label: Extra info
sub_fields.name: extra_info
sub_fields.instructions: Add any extra info related to the possession status

fields.label: Taxes
fields.name: taxes
fields.instructions: Add any tax info here. Leave blank if none exists.

sub_fields.label: Extra info
sub_fields.name: extra_info
sub_fields.instructions: Add any extra info related to the tax info

sub_fields.label: Extra info
sub_fields.name: extra_info
sub_fields.instructions: Add any extra info related to the cultivation status
